data.name: Faircroft's Antiques: The Heir of Glen Kinnoch
data.detailed_description:
You May Also Like

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1823330/Faircrofts_Antiques_The_Mountaineers_Legacy/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1961930/I_Love_Finding_MORE_Pups/


About the Game

Mia Faircroft’s adventures continue in The Heir of Glen Kinnoch as she returns in this thrilling new hidden object adventure!



When the untimely demise of one William MacDougal leaves his castle without an heir, Mia is called on to the humble little town of Glen Kinnoch to retrace his past and find his relatives.



Uncover long-lost secrets through beautifully rendered hidden object scenes, piece together art and history in engaging minigames, and help the townsfolk find a new future in Faircroft’s Antiques: The Heir of Glen Kinnoch!
data.about_the_game:
Mia Faircroft’s adventures continue in The Heir of Glen Kinnoch as she returns in this thrilling new hidden object adventure!



When the untimely demise of one William MacDougal leaves his castle without an heir, Mia is called on to the humble little town of Glen Kinnoch to retrace his past and find his relatives.



Uncover long-lost secrets through beautifully rendered hidden object scenes, piece together art and history in engaging minigames, and help the townsfolk find a new future in Faircroft’s Antiques: The Heir of Glen Kinnoch!
data.short_description: Mia Faircroft’s adventures continue in The Heir of Glen Kinnoch! In this classic Hidden Object Game, search through bright and beautiful locations, restore priceless antiques in exciting minigames, and uncover who will inherit Castle MacDougal.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese
data.reviews:
“Faircroft’s Antiques: The Heir of Glen Kinnoch is the second of five installments in the Faircroft’s Antiques hidden object games series and is quite a noticeable step up from the first game in terms of graphics’ sharpness and story cohesion.”
85% – Lilly's Corner Reviews

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 1GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Dual-Core) Quad Core Recommended CPU Speed: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD2600, Geforce 8600, with 512 MB VRam or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
